name: Cams Robotic House
description:
Welcome to Cams Robotic House!

Today there is a pez sale, and you get to participate!

Have fun with Cams friends and the items lying around!

Just don't steal, THAT'S ILLEGAL!

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click or touch to interact

Right click to use item

Mouse to rotate

Escape to pause

While paused controls:

Escape to go to title

R to restart level

Space to go back to playing

Credits:

Baldis basics for the sprite script and inspiration

Notes:

not all characters were finished in time! 2.1 will have 2 more.

not all minigames were finished in time! 2.1 will have 3 more.
